body.name: VECELO Queen Size Bed Frame with Headboard, 14 Inch Metal Platform Mattress Foundation, No Boxing Spring Needed, Squeak Resistant, Easy Assembly, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 35 mins
features: 【ROBUST AND LONG-LASTING】Crafted from premium-quality metal, this queen bed frames boasts stability and durability. Its dependable structure incorporates 13 sturdy metal slats, ensuring robust support and an undisturbed night's sleep. With a maximum weight capacity of 600 lbs, it offers both strength and comfort.

【ELEGANT DESIGN】 Elevate your living space with this queen bed frame with headboard. Its gracefully curved lines and substantial tube frame exude a sense of contemporary style that seamlessly integrates into your home decor. Whether your bedroom or guest room boasts a vintage, industrial, or modern aesthetic, this metal bed frame full is a flawless fit that enhances the overall ambiance.

【EFFORTLESS ASSEMBLY】Streamlining the setup process, we furnish all essential hardware and tools alongside a detailed installation manual. Furthermore, this metal queen size bed frame features slide-in slots and a folding construction, enabling swift and hassle-free assembly.

【UNDER-BED STORAGE SOLUTION】Elevate your storage possibilities with this 14-inch high platform queen bed frame, offering a generous 12 inches of clearance underneath. This ample space allows for the placement of storage boxes, effectively organizing your clothing or quilts. Experience the satisfaction of a well-organized home made possible by this smart and functional design.

【PEACEFUL SLUMBER】Experience uninterrupted rest on the queen size bed, thoughtfully equipped with padded strips to eliminate friction between slats and frames, ensuring a quiet sleep environment. Embrace the tranquility of every noise-free moment for a rejuvenating night's sleep.
body.description: Introducing the VECELO Metal Platform Bed Frame with Headboard and Footboard—a Perfect Blend of Style and FunctionalityRobust and Long-Lasting : Crafted from premium-quality metal, this bed frame boasts stability and durability. Its dependable structure incorporates 13 sturdy metal slats, ensuring robust support and an undisturbed night's sleep. With a maximum weight capacity of 350-600 lbs, it offers both strength and comfort.No Box Spring Required: Enjoy hassle-free assembly and a clean look without the need for a box spring.FREE Shipping and Supportive Service: Our bed frames are directly sold and shipped by Amazon, logistics timeliness is secured. Furthermore, no-cost return service within a 30-day window.Under-Bed Storage Solution: Elevate your storage possibilities with this 14-inch high platform queen bed frame, offering a generous 12 inches of clearance underneath. This ample space allows for the placement of storage boxes, effectively organizing your clothing or quilts.Discover the perfect marriage of style, convenience, and tranquility with the VECELO Metal Platform Bed Frame. Redefine your sleep experience and enhance your bedroom's allure with this exceptional addition.Specifications :Material: Powder-Coated MetalMax. Loaded Capacity: 350-600 lbsBed Height: 14 inchUnder Bed Clearance: 12 inchRecommended Mattress Thickness: 6-12 inch

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bed Frame Information Brand: VECELOAssembly Required: YesFurniture Finish: BlackFinish Type: Powder CoatedMaterial: MetalMaximum Weight Recommendation: 600 lbsIncluded Components: Headboard; Footboard; Slats; Installation ManualSpecial Feature: No Boxing Needed; Squeak Resistant; Easy Assembly

VECELO Metal Bed Frame with Headboard Meticulously fashioned from premium metal, this bed frame radiates stability and durability. Its reliable structure features 13 robust metal slats and is fortified by 6 center support legs, ensuring unwavering support and a tranquil night's rest. Boasting an impressive weight capacity of up to 350-600 lbs, it harmonizes strength and comfort seamlessly. Furthermore, This metal bed frame is thoughtfully designed with convenient slide-in slots and a folding construction, allowing for a rapid and effortless assembly process. Elevate your bedroom experience with the Metal Bed Frame's blend of durability, aesthetic finesse, and practicality. Transform your sleeping space into a haven of relaxation and refinement with this exceptional addition!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy, Nice Design and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I liked the bed frame very much. It's very sturdy and very nice design and material used on the bed frame. instructions are very clear and easy to assemble. It took me around 30 minutes to assemble it fully. I liked it and enjoying it so far. I recommend it please give it a try you are going to love it. So far everything is good. Please keep up the good quality. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, instructions were to the point and it came together within an hour. Looks very nice and is durable! Very affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price-quality relationship
reviews.reviewText: I needed it for my daughter’s bed. After doing some research I came up with this frame. Very good quality for the price you are paying, and it’s super affordable. It comes with specific instructions on how to assemble it (it also comes with some extra screws). It is so sturdy and would buy again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Longer than was previously posted.
reviews.reviewText: Thought I was going crazy with this bed frame. Before ordering I measured, read the listing then measured again. I would have 1.5 inches of clearance to the door I was planning on putting it near and ordered 2. When they showed up I assembled the bed frames and one blocked the door. Read the listing and measured the frame and it was correct. Measured the room and now it was magically 1" too big. They must have updated this product RIGHT after I ordered it. As of May '23 the measurements listed are correct but it's rather annoying that I happened to order it right in the middle of the update.Oh well. My guest room has a bed that the door hits. They'll survive.Assembly was easy for a single person. No help needed at all.For sturdiness I have to say I'm impressed. I can flop on it as a 190lb man and it doesn't feel like it's going to cave in. Unless you're BIG big you should have no issues.Decent quality for the price and I'd buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The most comfortable bed I've ever had. It is very durable and stable. And the price of this bed is quite reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assembly
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to assemble, also very sturdy. Leaves enough space underneath for storage as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Squeaky but cute
reviews.reviewText: Looks cute and pretty easy to assembleThe only thing is that the middle bars that go across the frame seem to easily come out andI’ve had the bed for a month and it’s very squeakyBesides that and those middle bars, it’s an OK purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and elegant
reviews.reviewText: This queen bed is perfect for a 6 inch mattress and gives an old rustic look.
